sqlMap.select: SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T2.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T2.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T2.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T2.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM USE_STAT_CNT_RECENT T2 WHERE T2.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T2.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T2.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T1.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T1.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp) - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS totalTrans FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing, 0 avgUsingDst ,0 totalTrans FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT NVL((SUM(AVG_USING) + SUM(AVG_USING_DST))/1000/COUNT(1),0) FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss')

SELECT NVL(SUM(AVG_USING_DST)/1000/COUNT(1),0) FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss')

SELECT NVL(SUM(AVG_USING)/COUNT(1),0) FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss')

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS avgUsing FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsingDst FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1 WHERE T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(#nDate#)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(#nDate#)+0, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS totalTrans FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE IN
#arrayDstCode[]#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing, 0 avgUsingDst ,0 totalTrans FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T2.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T2.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T2.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T2.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM USE_STAT_CNT_RECENT T2
T2.SYS_CODE IN
#arrayDstCode[]#
AND T2.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T2.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T2.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T1.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T1.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE IN
#arrayDstCode[]#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM COMPONENT C,ORG D WHERE C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_ID and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
C.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
C.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT C.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID , C.ORG_ID ORG_ID , C.CODE CODE , C.NAME NAME,C.STATE STATE, C.DESCRIPTOR DESCRIPTOR,D.NAME ORG_NAME FROM COMPONENT C,ORG D WHERE C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_ID AND D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
C.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
C.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D
A.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId#
AND C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT D.SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID, D.SERVICE_CODE SERVICE_CODE, D.SERVICE_CN_NAME SERVICE_CN_NAME, D.SERVICE_EN_NAME SERVICE_EN_NAME, A.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID, A.NAME COMPONENT_NAME, E.NAME ORG_NAME FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,ORG E
A.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId#
AND C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND A.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans FROM(SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS totalTrans FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE=#dstCode# T1.INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing, 0 avgUsingDst ,0 totalTrans FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour, case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM(SELECT T2.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T2.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T2.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T2.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM USE_STAT_CNT_RECENT T2
T2.SYS_CODE=#dstCode# T2.BIZ_INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T2.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T2.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T2.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth, to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM(SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T1.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T1.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE=#dstCode# T1.INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT D.SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID, D.SERVICE_CODE SERVICE_CODE, D.SERVICE_CN_NAME SERVICE_CN_NAME, D.SERVICE_EN_NAME SERVICE_EN_NAME, A.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID, A.CODE COMPONENT_CODE, A.NAME COMPONENT_NAME, E.NAME ORG_NAME FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,ORG E WHERE C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND A.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#
D.SERVICE_CODE IN
#serviceCodeArr[]#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT D.SERVICE_ID AS serviceId, D.SERVICE_CN_NAME AS serviceCnName, D.SERVICE_EN_NAME AS serviceEnName, D.SERVICE_CODE AS serviceCode FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D where C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN #inArray[]#
GROUP BY D.SERVICE_ID, A.COMPONENT_ID,D.SERVICE_CN_NAME,D.SERVICE_EN_NAME,D.SERVICE_CODE ORDER BY D.SERVICE_ID desc

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,ORG E WHERE C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND A.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#
D.SERVICE_CODE IN
#serviceCodeArr[]#

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T2.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T2.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T2.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T2.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM USE_STAT_CNT_RECENT T2
T2.SYS_CODE=#dstCode# T2.BIZ_INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T2.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T2.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T2.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans,0 totalBizErr,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM(SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T1.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T1.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE=#dstCode# T1.INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour, case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS totalTrans FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.DST_CODE=#dstCode# T1.INTF_CODE=#intfCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing, 0 avgUsingDst ,0 totalTrans FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID AS bizFunctionId,F.CODE AS code,F.NAME AS name FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,FUNC_2_SERVICE E,BIZ_FUNCTION F where C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.SERVICE_ID = E.SERVICE_ID AND E.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID = F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID AND F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN #inArray[]#
GROUP BY F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID,F.CODE,F.NAME

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,FUNC_2_SERVICE E,BIZ_FUNCTION F,ORG G WHERE C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.SERVICE_ID = E.SERVICE_ID AND E.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID = F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID AND A.ORG_ID = G.ORG_ID AND G.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#
F.CODE IN
#bizFuncArr[]#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY BIZ_FUNCTION_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID BIZ_FUNCTION_ID,F.CODE CODE,F.NAME NAME,G.NAME ORG_NAME,A.NAME COMPONENT_NAME FROM COMPONENT A, TECH_IMPL B, SER_TECH_IMPL C, SERVICE D,FUNC_2_SERVICE E,BIZ_FUNCTION F,ORG G WHERE C.STATE NOT IN ('X', 'G') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND D.SERVICE_ID = E.SERVICE_ID AND E.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID = F.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID AND A.ORG_ID = G.ORG_ID AND G.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.ORG_ID IN
#orgArr[]#
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#componentArr[]#
F.CODE IN
#bizFuncArr[]#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(avgUsing) AS avgUsing,SUM(avgUsingDst) AS avgUsingDst,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.AVG_USING) AS avgUsing,SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST) AS avgUsingDst,(SUM(T1.AVG_USING)+SUM(T1.AVG_USING_DST)) AS totalTrans FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.BIZ_CODE=#bizCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 avgUsing, 0 avgUsingDst ,0 totalTrans FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth, to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual,(select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM( SELECT T1.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T1.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T1.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T1.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM REG_STAT_RECENT T1
T1.BIZ_CODE=#bizCode#
AND T1.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T1.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T1.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour, case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour, case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth, to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId

SELECT dateTranId ,SUM(totalTrans) AS totalTrans,SUM(totalBizErr) AS totalBizErr,SUM(totalSysErr) AS totalSysErr FROM(SELECT T2.DATE_TRAN_ID AS dateTranId,SUM(T2.TOTAL_TRANS) AS totalTrans,SUM(T2.TOTAL_BIZ_ERR) AS totalBizErr,SUM(T2.TOTAL_SYS_ERR) AS totalSysErr FROM USE_STAT_CNT_RECENT T2
T2.BIZ_CODE=#bizCode#
AND T2.DATE_TYPE = 1 AND T2.tenant_Id =#tenantId# AND T2.DATE_TRAN_ID BETWEEN TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') AND TO_CHAR(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') GROUP BY DATE_TRAN_ID UNION ALL
SELECT smonth || shour || sminute dateTranId ,0 totalTrans, 0 totalBizErr ,0 totalSysErr FROM (select smonth,case when shour < 10 then 0 || to_char(shour) else to_char(shour) end shour,case when sminute < 10 then 0 || to_char(sminute) else to_char(sminute) end sminute from (select smonth, case when sminute > 59 then shour + 1 else shour end shour,case when sminute > 59 then sminute - 60 else sminute end sminute from (select to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'yyyyMMdd')) smonth,to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'hh24')) shour, (to_number(to_char(to_date(#nDate#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') - 1 / 24, 'mi'))-1) + rownum sminute from dual, (select rownum n from all_objects c where rownum < 61)))) )GROUP BY dateTranId ORDER BY dateTranId
